description.zh-cn: 台湾政治人物，民主进步党籍，曾任立法委员、台北市议会议员及新潮流系总召。
description.en: A Taiwanese politician of the Democratic Progressive Party, former Legislator, Taipei City Councilor, and convener of the New Tide faction.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国的政党，段宜康为其党员。
description.en: A political party in the Republic of China (Taiwan), of which Duan Yi-kang is a member.

description.zh-cn: 民主进步党内的派系之一，段宜康曾任总召。
description.en: A faction within the Democratic Progressive Party; Duan Yi-kang formerly served as its convener.

description.zh-cn: 段宜康的父亲，记者出身，曾任《公论报》记者、《大华晚报》总编辑。
description.en: Duan Yi-kang's father, a former journalist who served as a reporter for the Public Opinion Daily and editor-in-chief of the Dahua Evening News.

description.zh-cn: 段宜康的妻子。
description.en: Spouse of Duan Yi-kang.

description.zh-cn: 台湾政治人物，曾任《民进报》总编辑，段宜康曾为其助理。
description.en: A Taiwanese politician and former editor-in-chief of the DPP News, for whom Duan Yi-kang served as an assistant.

description.zh-cn: 台湾政治人物，段宜康曾担任其助理。
description.en: A Taiwanese politician for whom Duan Yi-kang served as an assistant.

description.zh-cn: 台湾政治人物，曾任澎湖县长，段宜康曾担任其特别助理。
description.en: A Taiwanese politician and former Magistrate of Penghu County, for whom Duan Yi-kang served as a special assistant.

description.zh-cn: 台湾政治人物，因被段宜康指控涉及中华民国曲棍球协会弊案而引发“吞曲棍球”争议，并对段宜康提起诉讼。
description.en: A Taiwanese politician who was accused by Duan Yi-kang of being involved in a corruption case related to the Chinese Taipei Hockey Association, leading to the "swallowing hockey pucks" controversy and a lawsuit against Duan.

description.zh-cn: 台湾政治人物，因段宜康指控其与林沧敏共用金主而对其提起诉讼，该案最终段宜康被判无罪。
description.en: A Taiwanese politician who sued Duan Yi-kang after he accused her and Lin Tsang-min of sharing the same financial backer. Duan was ultimately acquitted in the case.

description.zh-cn: 台湾政治人物，在2014年彰化县长选举期间，被段宜康指控为林沧敏与黄文玲的共同金主。
description.en: A Taiwanese politician who was accused by Duan Yi-kang of being the common financial backer for both Lin Tsang-min and Huang Wen-ling during the 2014 Changhua County magistrate election.

description.zh-cn: 2016年举行的台湾地方公职人员补选。其中花莲市长补选后，段宜康因发表针对选举结果和选民的争议言论而引发风波。
description.en: Local public official by-elections held in Taiwan in 2016. After the Hualien mayoral by-election, Duan Yi-kang caused a stir with controversial remarks about the election results and voters.

description.zh-cn: 台湾政治人物，时任台北农产运销公司总经理时，因2016年菜价高涨事件被段宜康指控为“菜虫”，引发激烈争论。
description.en: A Taiwanese politician. While serving as the general manager of the Taipei Agricultural Products Marketing Corporation, he was accused by Duan Yi-kang of being a 'vegetable worm' (profiteer) during the 2016 vegetable price hike, leading to a heated dispute.

description.zh-cn: 台湾网络名人、企业家，因评论政府对外捐款事宜与段宜康在网络上发生激烈争论。
description.en: A Taiwanese internet personality and entrepreneur who engaged in a fierce online debate with Duan Yi-kang over the government's foreign aid donations.

description.zh-cn: 台湾作家、政治人物，担任文化部长期间，在立法院因答询问题与时任立委的段宜康发生激烈质询冲突。
description.en: A Taiwanese writer and politician. During her tenure as Minister of Culture, she had a heated confrontation with then-Legislator Duan Yi-kang in the Legislative Yuan over questioning.

description.zh-cn: 段宜康是民主进步党的党员，并曾代表该党担任多项公职。
description.en: Duan Yi-kang is a member of the Democratic Progressive Party and has held several public offices on behalf of the party.

description.zh-cn: 段宜康曾担任新潮流系的总召，后于2005年12月辞去该职务。
description.en: Duan Yi-kang previously served as the convener of the New Tide faction, a position he resigned from in December 2005.

description.zh-cn: 1988年，段宜康担任时任《民进报》总编辑林浊水的助理。
description.en: In 1988, Duan Yi-kang worked as an assistant to Lin Cho-shui, who was the editor-in-chief of the DPP News.

position.zh-cn: 联合助理、台南服务处主任
position.en: Joint Assistant, Tainan Service Office Director

description.zh-cn: 1991年，段宜康担任立法委员洪奇昌、卢修一、叶菊兰的联合助理，同年亦担任洪奇昌台南服务处主任。
description.en: In 1991, Duan Yi-kang served as a joint assistant to legislators Hung Chi-chang, Lu Hsiu-yi, and Yeh Chu-lan. In the same year, he also served as the director of Hung Chi-chang's Tainan service office.

description.zh-cn: 1993年，段宜康在高植澎当选澎湖县长后，担任其特别助理。
description.en: In 1993, after Kao Chih-peng was elected Magistrate of Penghu County, Duan Yi-kang served as his special assistant.

description.zh-cn: 段宜康在2014年11月指控时任国民党立委的林沧敏涉及中华民国曲棍球协会弊案，并引发了“吞曲棍球”的赌注争议。林沧敏后对此提起诉讼。
description.en: In November 2014, Duan Yi-kang accused then-KMT legislator Lin Tsang-min of being involved in a corruption case concerning the Chinese Taipei Hockey Association, leading to a controversial bet involving 'swallowing hockey pucks'. Lin later filed a lawsuit in response.

description.zh-cn: 段宜康指控2014年彰化县长候选人黄文玲与国民党候选人林沧敏共用金主萧景田。黄文玲因此对段宜康提起诉讼，最终法院改判段宜康无罪。
description.en: Duan Yi-kang accused Huang Wen-ling, a 2014 candidate for Changhua County Magistrate, of sharing the same financial backer, Hsiao Ching-tien, with KMT candidate Lin Tsang-min. Huang sued Duan for these remarks, and the court ultimately acquitted Duan.

description.zh-cn: 根据段宜康的指控，萧景田在2014年彰化县长选举中资助了候选人黄文玲。
description.en: According to allegations by Duan Yi-kang, Hsiao Ching-tien financially backed candidate Huang Wen-ling in the 2014 Changhua County magistrate election.

description.zh-cn: 根据段宜康的指控，萧景田在2014年彰化县长选举中资助了候选人林沧敏。
description.en: According to allegations by Duan Yi-kang, Hsiao Ching-tien financially backed candidate Lin Tsang-min in the 2014 Changhua County magistrate election.

description.zh-cn: 在2016年花莲市长补选后，段宜康因发表“没办法假装不鄙视那些选民”的言论而引发巨大争议，损害其公众形象，并为此公开道歉。
description.en: After the 2016 Hualien mayoral by-election, Duan Yi-kang sparked significant controversy and damaged his public image by stating he 'couldn't pretend not to despise those voters', for which he later publicly apologized.

description.zh-cn: 2016年10月，因台湾菜价高涨，段宜康指控时任台北农产运销公司总经理的韩国瑜为“菜虫”（意指市场中牟取暴利者），引发激烈争论。
description.en: In October 2016, amid soaring vegetable prices in Taiwan, Duan Yi-kang accused Han Kuo-yu, then the general manager of the Taipei Agricultural Products Marketing Corporation, of being a 'vegetable worm' (a term for a market profiteer), which triggered a heated dispute.

description.zh-cn: 2018年5月，因陈之汉批评政府对外捐款，段宜康在社交媒体上发文回击，双方爆发激烈网络论战。
description.en: In May 2018, after Holger Chen criticized the government's foreign aid donations, Duan Yi-kang responded on social media, leading to a fierce online feud between the two.

description.zh-cn: 2012年5月，段宜康在立法院质询时，批评时任文化部长龙应台为“厚脸皮”、“花瓶”，导致龙应台一度离席抗议，双方关系紧张。
description.en: In May 2012, during a legislative interpellation, Duan Yi-kang criticized then-Minister of Culture Lung Ying-tai as 'thick-skinned' and a 'vase', causing Lung to walk out in protest and creating tension between them.
